autumn.lang.compiler.errors.IErrorReporter

  • Packages that use IErrorReporter 
    Package Description
    autumn.lang.compiler
    Autumn Compiler and Related Utilities.
    autumn.lang.compiler.errors
    This package contains the code needed to report compile-time errors.
    high.mackenzie.autumn.lang.compiler.compilers
    (Private) Autumn's Compiler.

      void Autumn.setErrorReporter(IErrorReporter reporter)

    • Uses of IErrorReporter in autumn.lang.compiler.errors

      Classes in autumn.lang.compiler.errors that implement IErrorReporter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicErrorReporter
      An instance of this class is an error-reporter that reports errors to a PrintStream.
      class  CoupledErrorReporter
      An instance of this class is an error-reporter that routes reports through two other error-reporters.
      Methods in autumn.lang.compiler.errors that return IErrorReporter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IErrorReporter CoupledErrorReporter.reporter1()
      This method retrieves the first error-reporter.
      IErrorReporter CoupledErrorReporter.reporter2()
      This method retrieves the second error-reporter.
